document.full_text: libyan leader col. muammar el-qaddafi is not prepared to leave libya but will press efforts to find a political solution to the country's conflict, south african president jacob zuma said on tuesday.
document.title: zuma says qaddafi refuses to leave libya
lines_and_colors: libyan leader col. muammar el-qaddafi is not prepared to leave libya but will press efforts to find a political solution to the country's conflict, south african president jacob zuma said on tuesday.
